title: +Control Diario Epilepsia
description:
With the aim of improving the quality of life of patients with epilepsy, + Control Diario Epilepsia offers tools to carry out precise monitoring of the disease, as well as functionalities to notify emergencies. With + Epilepsy Daily Control it is possible to record the date and time of the seizures, administration of medications, recording videos and recording relevant information that will help your doctor prescribe the most appropriate treatment.

More information:

Emergency
* Notify an emergency with a single touch
* Automatically send an emergency message with your location on google maps.
* Directly dial your emergency contacts

First aid
* Access important information for emergency situations.
* Record an emergency video and save it in your app diary

Proceedings
* Stores all the information related to your epilepsy

Keep track of your medication
* Stores information about your epilepsy to share in emergency situations
* Customize your application.

Daily
* Register and manage all the information necessary to control your epilepsy

Register your medical consultations
* Keep a log of your days
* Register data of your crises and keep track


Medical Guide
* Learn more about epilepsy
* Access a variety of important topics about epilepsy
